publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5247 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Kleinwort Benson—That the Parliament notes the announcement by Kleinwort Benson of the company’s intention to establish a permanent presence in Edinburgh; welcomes the decision to open new offices and invest in additional staff, and believes that the decision represents a vote of confidence in Scotland’s financial services sector, its personnel and infrastructure.
S3M-5247 Kleinwort Benson (lodged on 20 November 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5247 Kleinwort Benson (lodged on 20 November 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-5247 Kleinwort Benson (lodged on 20 November 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-5247 Kleinwort Benson (lodged on 20 November 2009) Dave Thompson*
